tasks.label: build-fat-jar
tasks.command: rm -rf out && mkdir -p out && javac -cp "lib/*" -d out src/IndiceAirbnb.java && cd out && jar xf ../lib/commons-lang3-3.12.0.jar && jar xf ../lib/lucene-core-10.3.1.jar && jar xf ../lib/lucene-analysis-common-10.3.1.jar && jar xf ../lib/lucene-suggest-10.3.1.jar && cd .. && echo "Main-Class: IndiceAirbnb" > MANIFEST.MF && jar cfm indexador.jar MANIFEST.MF -C out .
